pageProps.content:
Experience

Lalibela Game Reserve in the Eastern Cape consists of 7,500 hectares of land & is home to Africa’s Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino.
Only an hour away from Port Elizabeth & Addo Elephant Park, Lalibela is the perfect safari getaway for guests visiting the Garden Route on a self-drive holiday.

Stay

Lalibela Tree Tops Lodge boasts 5 luxury safari tents perched high on thatched platforms at “tree top” level & are joined by raised walkways. Beautiful views can be enjoyed from these treehouse-like tents.
The tents have canvas walls & thatched roofs with huge window areas & private verandas, so guests can truly enjoy the ‘bird’s eye view’ from their rooms.
The main area includes a large lounge, bar & open-air dining deck with a view over a waterhole. Guests can also cool off in the swimming pool after a day out in the bush.

Activities

Guests visiting Lalibela can expect to see a variety of game during their time on safari. Twice daily game drives in open 4x4 vehicles will ensure excellent photographic opportunities & close wildlife encounters.
Daily walking safaris are a fun & exciting way of getting closer to nature. Guests can also learn how to track animals on foot - a true adventure.
